com.googlecode.jsonrpc4j

Class JsonRpcHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.jsonrpc4j.JsonRpcClient
      • com.googlecode.jsonrpc4j.JsonRpcHttpClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IJsonRpcClient

    public class JsonRpcHttpClient
extends JsonRpcClient
implements IJsonRpcClient
    A JSON-RPC client that uses the HTTP protocol.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JsonRpcHttpClient

        public JsonRpcHttpClient(java.net.URL serviceUrl,
                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers)
        Creates the JsonRpcHttpClient bound to the given serviceUrl. The headers provided in the headers map are added to every request made to the serviceUrl.
        Parameters:
        serviceUrl - the service end-point URL
        headers - the headers

      • JsonRpcHttpClient

        public JsonRpcHttpClient(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper,
                         java.net.URL serviceUrl,
                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers)
        Creates the JsonRpcHttpClient bound to the given serviceUrl. The headers provided in the headers map are added to every request made to the serviceUrl.
        Parameters:
        mapper - the ObjectMapper to use for json<->java conversion
        serviceUrl - the service end-point URL
        headers - the headers

      • JsonRpcHttpClient

        public JsonRpcHttpClient(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper,
                         java.net.URL serviceUrl,
                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers,
                         boolean gzipRequests,
                         boolean acceptGzipResponses)
        Creates the JsonRpcHttpClient bound to the given serviceUrl. The headers provided in the headers map are added to every request made to the serviceUrl.
        Parameters:
        mapper - the ObjectMapper to use for json<->java conversion
        serviceUrl - the service end-point URL
        headers - the headers
        gzipRequests - whether gzip the request
        acceptGzipResponses - whether accept gzip response

      • JsonRpcHttpClient

        public JsonRpcHttpClient(java.net.URL serviceUrl)
        Creates the JsonRpcHttpClient bound to the given serviceUrl. The headers provided in the headers map are added to every request made to the serviceUrl.
        Parameters:
        serviceUrl - the service end-point URL
